Description: Incredibly spacious and sunny in convenient South Boston location! This fantastic townhouse style apartment features a sunny living room and updated kitchen on the first level. The kitchen has a dishwasher and granite counters. Hardwood floors flow throughout the space. Upstairs are two spacious bedrooms, each with their own en-suite bathroom. The apartment also has a half bath for guests, in-unit laundry and a balcony. All of this in a great location convenient to Red Line, restaurants, shopping and more! Call today to see this great apartment! Joli Almeida, Boston Property Group
